document_data.name: Touch of Fatigue
document_data.mainbody: '''''Touch of fatigue''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that instilled fatigue in the target.
document_data.Effects: On casting ''touch of fatigue'', the caster gained the ability to channel [[negative energy]] with a touch. On touching the target, this negative energy was channeled through the target and the target became fatigued. This fatigue was purely sustained by [[magic]] and therefore ended with the spell.
document_data.Components: ''Touch of fatigue'' required somatic, verbal, and material components. The needed material component was a drop of sweat.
